backFields.label: Test Purpose
backFields.value:
Test 2: Future Semantics Dates

This test validates that semantics work with long-term future dates (5-year span).

Original V5 Issue:
• eventStartDate was in the past (2024-03-15)
• iOS may reject passes with past event dates

Fixed in this test:
• eventStartDate: 2025-11-01 (future)
• eventEndDate: 2029-03-15 (5 years out)

Treating LIFT Certificate as ongoing engagement event spanning issue to maturity dates.

backFields.label: Venue Details
backFields.value:
Bell Tower Hall
Frederick, Maryland

Walking distance from downtown Frederick. Parking available on-site.

backFields.label: Your Certificate
backFields.value: This LIFT Certificate represents your participation in Exchange Reserve's regenerative capital framework. As an Early Adopter, you have priority access to Impact Briefings and exclusive community events.

backFields.label: Test Verification
backFields.value:
This is Test 2 in the V5 isolation testing series.

Serial Number: V5-TEST-2-FUTURE-SEMANTICS

locations.relevantText: Welcome to Bell Tower Hall! Your Impact Briefing starts soon.
